subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Marco Materazzi, the Italian defender who was head-butted by Zinedine Zidane in the 2006 World Cup final, says he plans to tour the United States in a motor home with family and friends during this year’s Cup. Materazzi said he was still so angry over the Zidane incident that he would not watch this year’s tournament in South Africa. He told La Repubblica that he was still waiting for Zidane to apologize.
